Package net.neoforged.neoforge.client.event

Class ModelEvent.RegisterGeometryLoaders

java.lang.Object
net.neoforged.bus.api.Event
net.neoforged.neoforge.client.event.ModelEvent
net.neoforged.neoforge.client.event.ModelEvent.RegisterGeometryLoaders
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.neoforged.fml.event.IModBusEvent
Enclosing class:
ModelEvent
public static class ModelEvent.RegisterGeometryLoaders extends ModelEvent implements net.neoforged.fml.event.IModBusEvent
Allows users to register their own geometry loaders for use in block/item models.

This event is not cancellable, and does not

invalid reference 
have a result
.

This event is fired on the mod-specific event bus, only on the logical client.
